website_summaries.verdict: Warm, comfortable and well-padded, yet stable on the ice, these are standout skates.
pros: Comfortable, well-padded and sturdy, with a fit that almost matches standard shoe sizes
Feet stay warm on the ice
Stylish cuts that stand out from more traditional skates
cons: Size runs a little bit small, so most need to order a half size bigger
Tightening strap may break down and loosen after several uses

customer_reviews.title: Was nice, not for long.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice skates. Go with your shoe size. I got 11's, my shoe size 10.5. A bit too big. Should have gone with 10.5. Update 12/13/2017. After 5 or 6 times on the ice 2 pins attaching the blade to the shoe got lose and now the blade is moving. I am not sure what to do. Afraid to use it as it is now.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kopec

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable skate... roller-blade like feel.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable ice skate I've ever owned. Padded like a roller blade boot. Good support. Warm on the ice. No break in required. My only complaint... most boot straps have a lever buckle to clasp and tighten them. This pair does not... you have to pull the strap tight by hand, which leads me to believe this strap will eventually break. Nevertheless, no regrets in buying these skates. I'm just a casual skater, and these are perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Dubs

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner skater that wanted to get away from the terrible rental skates they have at the rink. After much research, I settled on these since they weren't too brightly colored but also looked comfortable. The comfort level is unbelievable! I can easily skate for hours in these things even without wearing thick socks, and the stability I have on the ice while wearing these boots feels almost like I'm cheating. My only complaint is that I've almost tripped myself a few times with the toe picks, but that's the nature of figure-skating type blades. My blades did arrive sharpened.
customer_reviews.author: DefCello

customer_reviews.title: Good Comfortable, Well-Fitting Skates
customer_reviews.text: The "size chart" Said size 8 for me, but I always wear size 10 shoes, So, I ordered size 10. They fit perfectly and are comfortable. Blade bottoms are a little rounded, but not as much as hockey skates. I am getting used to it - a little unstable going straight fast, but good for turning. The claws on the front of figure skates (this is standard) are the only reason I have ever fallen down. Good Skates
customer_reviews.author: Gary Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & fit perfectly.  A men's size 12 fits like a men's size 12.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but fit well. They are sized for men so they fit perfectly; he takes a size 12, I ordered a size 12 & they fit like a size 12. I had a problem with a similar Ridell men's pair that I ordered first; they were sized for women but the listing didn't state that so I had to return the Ridell pair at my expense & order these.
customer_reviews.author: Road2clova

customer_reviews.title: Well built with good ankle support.
customer_reviews.text: I am a learner / beginner for ice skating. Decided to buy a skate rather than rent one for each training session. The pro shop at the venue recommended buying ones with good ankel support - This one, gives me very good ankle support and feels solid. The fit was good ( it was quite dic=fficult to get my size too ) - but i am quite glad i got this. IT feels solidly built, and gives good ankle suppport.
customer_reviews.author: Jay C

customer_reviews.title: Will never rent those foot killers again!
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly, I do a size 12 men's shoe and these are size 12 men's skates. Never again will I have to rent awful skates that kill my feet. I was able to skate for 30 minutes straight with one little pit stop to tighten up the laces a tad. I could have gone for an hour or two but I hit the last 30 minutes of open skating thinking that would be enough I could handle breaking them in.
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: These skates are extremely comfortable and true to size. My friend loves them. They also come with guards to protect the blades and a velcro latch to secure the top of your skates. With these skates, you can go extremely fast and also control the speed at which you skate. I would highly recommend them. Also, they stay clean no matter how much you use them since they're black. These are really great skates and a reasonable price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was a good fit. I used the chart on the listing. The blade was ready to go out of the box. Having to used it a couple of times only, it was comfortable even after 2 hours of continues skating.
customer_reviews.author: EMOSFET

customer_reviews.title: Most painful skates I’ve ever worn
customer_reviews.text: The most painful skates I’ve ever tried. They seemed to be sized right, but they made my heals hurt after 5 min to the point o had to stop skating for the day. My 5yo and I were very disappointed. Not sure why everyone else loves them and I hate them, but these are not the skates for me.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Goff

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates for a Pre- Teen Boy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these skates for my nearly 12-year old grandson who had been enjoying them immensely. They are holding up very well. I was concerned that they might be too heavy but he had no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Poppleton

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I'll save anyone with a wide foot the trouble : Do not buy these! My 11 year old son wore these for only 10 minutes because were so painful in the width. Other than that, they seemed well constructed & sturdy for a recreational skate. I'm giving a good rating for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Comfortable, Support
customer_reviews.text: Trust the fitting chart! No need to allow for extra sock thickness- the boot insulation is great. Comfortable and great foot/ankle support. Blades arrive plenty sharp for recreational use.
customer_reviews.author: haycreek

customer_reviews.title: Good for starter
customer_reviews.text: This should be a 5 star product. The only reason I gave 4 stars is the shoelaces are easily to be sticked on the magic stick. The shoelaces can be hurt if you try to pull the shoelaces out of there.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: My son loved his skates!
customer_reviews.text: It can be challenging to find the right skate for someone else. These Skates were a hit, right out of the box. The fit was perfect and the quality outstanding. My 22 year old son loved this Christmas gift. He lives in a big city and is looking for gear this winter to enjoy the city skating rink. Thank you for these outstanding skates. Mom did good this Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Traverse City

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son a few months ago, and he has been pleased with them. He is a casual skater and also fairly new to ice skating, so we only have rental skates to compare to. He wears a 10.5 shoe, and we bought these in a size 11. I was worried they would be too big, but they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: My3Boys

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend them
customer_reviews.text: These skates are exactly what I wanted - sturdy, cushioned to keep feet warm and comfortable on ice, and at the same token stylishly attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Massoud

customer_reviews.title: The toe kick is too long and you may want to have it ground down
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates as a beginner learning how to skate. They are very warm and comfortable and I have not had any issues with fit or comfort. One thing I did was have the toe kick ground down as it stuck out too far. After removing the first tooth they worked great and have held up well!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Lienemann

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Great skates for recreation, front tooth is very aggressive and I had problems with it catching the ice. But I filed it down and I believe they will be fine. I am 67 years old and these skates provide good support and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney K.

customer_reviews.title: Much too stiff.
customer_reviews.text: makes it very hard to bend knees in. also too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Benadette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. I ordered his regular shoe size and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these skated, said they keep him warm and very comfortable. He also said they didn't run or chaif which is a rarity for shoes he buys. Overall we are very satisfied and look forward to using these a ton.
customer_reviews.author: Areeje

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, even for a wide foot
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a skate that was easy to put on, wide enough for my son’s large and wide feet, warm, and a sort of cross between a hockey and figure skate. This skate did it all. My son really likes them as they are both comfortable and functional. These are solid and well made skates.
customer_reviews.author: averagemom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Skates!.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skate last month for my son and he loved it! He said that it is exactly what he needed, nice style and strong support for the ankles. I would recommend this skates for my friends also and I'm planning to buy one for mysell. Congratulations for the company who made this product!. Thanks a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Lan-Me

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! so comfy and nice. The only draw back was figuring out your size. so since I think it's mens sizing I ordered a size 9 based on the size chart and measuring my feet. I usually wear a women's 10, but my feet are wide. They seem to be great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kiley

customer_reviews.title: I have been skating a few times now and I'm very happy to have found these
customer_reviews.text: The few times I had been ice skating I had always used figure blades and not hockey blades, so when I needed to purchase some for trips to Canada, I found these. Following the advice on fit was very important. I have been skating a few times now and I'm very happy to have found these. The transaction and shipping were smooth. I certainly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Marty B

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Warm Skates
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised even during the week before Christmas. Great skates and great store.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates.
customer_reviews.text: Nice figure skates, the only thing missing is proper padding, I put in separate shock absorbing shoe liner pads for my old feet. I did have mine sharpened, although I don't know if this was really necessary.
customer_reviews.author: bctripp

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but one guard came broken
customer_reviews.text: The skates look good. Haven't tried them yet on an ice rink but they feel comfortable when I put them on in my house. One problem is that one of the blade guards was broken out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insulated ice skate best to keep a person feet warm
customer_reviews.text: Why I bough these skate because I have had frost bite on the toes in past these skates are insulated with thinsulate that made the difference for me I ware a 10 1/2 double E the size 11 fit just right .
customer_reviews.author: gary bye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, provides good support and are really comfortable but don't forget to take long socks
customer_reviews.author: Mitabini

customer_reviews.title: comfort, fit and style
customer_reviews.text: I used the skates for beginner lessons. I liked the Velcro ankle tightening strap was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Danzl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. one of the best shows on the market.Very comfortable, having it for a year.
customer_reviews.author: seyed behrad ghazi sharyatpanahi

customer_reviews.title: Best skates I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable, most stable and best looking skates I've ever used! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: NehemiahAdon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, and very comfortable, my husband loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Vosselman

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: these skates are great and super comfortable. i bought them so i could skate with my 9 yr old daughter. the first skates i have ever own.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT A.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very satisfied with these skates. He stated that they were like wearing a sneaker. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Young

customer_reviews.title: High quality fit performance at an exceptional value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Skates but don't forget to get them sharpened. Fits very well good support much better than second hand hockey skates. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Merriner

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these skates about twice a week for months. They are comfortable and sturdy. I have no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality !!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice skates that perform as advertised. Super competitive pricing and delivery was perfect. Thanks for keeping your promise of comfort, looks, and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect fitting
customer_reviews.text: great pair of skates. very comfortable. durable. perfect snug fitting..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are very good skates and comfortable on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Carney

customer_reviews.title: Best fit ever
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. First skates that have never hurt my feet when wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, warm and sharpened! :)
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, perfect fit, came sharpened and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: They were delivered super fast.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet, but they feel very comfortable and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Jackson Ultima Softec Elite ST7002 Black Mens Ice Skates with Mark II Blades
